overview:
Peter Weijmarshausen passion is to make new and exciting technology accessible for everyone.

He is currently the CEO at Shapeways were they are enabling co-creation through digital manufacturing. Using their portal 3D software users can have produced any product they design at acceptable prices.

At Aramiska and Sangine Weijmarshausen and his team designed and developed Satellite modems allowing people to easily access the internet through two-way Satellite connections. Enabling (mobile) broadband internet everywhere in Europe.

At Not a Number, Weijmarshausen and his team gave away the Blender 3D software, allowing people to get access to a fully featured 3D modeler, animation package at no cost. Through our portal we enabled them to use it with tutorials and manuals.

Peter Weijmarshausenâ€™s Specialties:

Business development Designing and implementing scalable Internet services (mail, web, web 2.0 services based on LAMP) Inter- and intranet infrastructure (routers, firewalls, switches, vpn) Telecom / Satellite Communication (DVB-RCS, TCP acceleration
